author: Andrew Beaton
title: Kansas Delivers a Knockout Punch to Advance to the Final Four
text:
There’s a twisted repercussion in an NCAA tournament full of upsets: When the good teams lose early, they never get to play each other. And this has been a stupendously mad March. Which has spawned Loyola-Chicago et al—and also very few games between the teams that spent the entire season showing they were the best in the entire country.
Kansas vs. Duke for a spot in the Final Four was the outlier. This was a No. 1 seed vs. a No. 2 seed, and not just any top-two teams. These are two programs that begin every season believing... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
